commit message: Nearly complete coverage of content types

Fixed opening links with capitalised schemes, change live links to
content type REDDIT as they're already handled by openRedditLink.java

Merge pull request #1407 from Nxt3/post-stuff

Nearly complete coverage of content types (NSFW posts)
Fixed Go to subreddit not working correctly with mixed/upper case input
Fixed merge
Fixed images getting out of order in comma separated Imgur album
Remove excessive case conversion
Tag external links with the application name that opens them or 'External'
Memoize external app name lookup
Fixed bad tinting of editor item icons
